content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for this prime location in the city center?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: To begin with, I am a student so I would like to pay as low as possible. I would say 300 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that's far below my asking price. I'm looking for a fair market value that reflects the quality of the apartment and its location. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Surely, I can increase my offer. How about 350 euros per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: While 350 euros is more in line with what I'm expecting, I still believe the apartment deserves a higher price considering the amenities and the central location. Would you be willing to go a bit higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I can do 375 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Your offer is getting closer to my expectations. However, I'm still looking for a tenant who appreciates the value of this apartment. Would you be willing to make one final increase?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, I can do 400 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 400 euros is still not enough for the quality and location of this apartment. I'm looking for a tenant who is willing to pay a fair market price. Would you be willing to go up to 450 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Unfortunately, I cannot afford 450 euros per month. That is too high for me. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too high for me to afford.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your position, Maryam. If you're unable to meet my asking price, perhaps we should consider terminating the negotiation. Would you like to discuss any other aspects of the rental agreement before we conclude?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
